Hi Lee,

You may be looking for Frank Sumption, he was the one on Art Bell'=
s show. He is also a friend of mine!

Suicide is never a pleasant subject, =
especially when committed due to emotional distress. No religion or spiritu=
ality supports this as a solution to any issue and believe it makes the "be=
yond" more difficult to navigate and understand. With that being said, the =
apparition that is being seen and the religious rites being asked for can m=
ean a number of things. The most likely is she feels like she needs these t=
hings to move on. She is probably fearful that her act has made her unfit f=
or life beyond our world. Most likely she was Catholic if she was asking fo=
r a mass (Catholics will not do this for suicides). 

What needs to happen =
is she needs to be reassured that she and all other entities of God are wel=
come and expected to evolve to higher planes. When we die we only are allow=
ed to see and experience what we are ready for or within our comfort range.=
 Lets say its designed into the system (for the lack o a better description=
). The only barriers to her spiritual evolution are in her mind, God and th=
e afterlife is always present but is not always visible.

Most likely she w=
as in a bad emotional place when she was alive and was the reason for her s=
uicide. That will carry on for a time until she snapps out of it. There are=
 always helpers with her whether she understands that or not.

Regards,

Fr=
ank Ratka=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=

Hello Frank,
I am new, my name is lee and b=
oth me and my son have heard you on the Art Bell show. My son is into elect=
ronics and will join soon but I have a question that you or your members mi=
ght be able to answer.
There is a person in Nova Scocia whos 14 yr old daug=
hter commited suicide by hanging in a tree.=C2=A0They keep getting that she=
 is asking for Masses and prayers to be said for her. Why do they need many=
 Masses said for them/ She is also always holding a Rose everytime she show=
s up.
Any thoughts on this subject? I dont know what to say to this lady.

=
Also, my son has built one of the radio shack boxes.

lee=C2=A0
